name: Catherine Wheeler

text: pizza and the scene here is better than most. Visited Sat afternoon. Service treated us so nice. Feels like a place in Los Angeles I liked.

text: Great vibe and Great pizza. The entire team and manager were so friendly- they were crazy busy but everyone worked quickly and really well together. We got our pizzas quick and everything was fresh and DELICIOUS! 10-outa-10 would DEFINITELY recommend!

text: Don't bother going to Pieology! It's wet and soggy pizza. This place on the other hand is like night and day. I always leave full and delightfully stuffed unlike some other joints. Love their selection of toppings and the blue sky root beer is my favorite.

text: You can't go wrong choosing this place, making your own pizza is awesome, picking what ingredients you want without penalty for each tasty ingredient... The pizza is just the right thickness, super tasty!

name: Jon Nagy
text:
Delicious and served quickly. It's
9 dollars for a personal pizza but I always have a piece or two leftover.

name: Benjamin Hodges
text: The manager, Beast, wore his facemask below his nose and upper lip. By the time our order was completed his mask was fully on his chin.

text: I haven't tried the pizza here, but I can already tell I'm gonna love it!  I get lots of orders here for Doordash and the staff is very friendly, making the pizza in open view.  The pizzas are fairly big for extra layers compared to some other establishments.

name: Cherry Siekawitch
text: Food was good, but I was more impressed with the employees. We've been here several times and everyone is always polite. This time there was A VERY difficult customer ahead of us. Everyone from the manager down was courteous and gracious in dealing with him. Congrats to a job well done.

name: Hemmyy The Paladin
text: Order take out pizza with Keto crust because of Celiac's. Took pizza home and got 1 slice in before I realized it was regular crust. No one responded to my phone call. Thanks, Blaze. It is going to be a long night.

text: Even if you have order online you will still wait 45 minutes in the lobby for your food and then it’s ice cold don’t bother calling either number is disconnected and no option to speak with a manager

name: Chuck Webb
text:

text: It was decent.  I ordered the small salad and 1/2 pizza combo. Mediterranean salad and mushroom pizza. I'd give it another try,  but get pizza only and not a salad.

text: This place is delicious! It's kind of a combination of subway and chipotle but for really tasty pizzas. The service is outstanding and the vibe of the place is great. The place was packed and for a good reason. It's really worth checking out.
